## endpoints variable

A extensible set of endpoints for calling Fauna.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
endpoints: Endpoints;
```

## Remarks

Most clients will will not need to extend this set.

## Example

\#\# To Extend

```typescript
// add to the endpoints constant
endpoints.myProxyEndpoint = new URL("https://my.proxy.url");
```
